DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to provide a holistic assessment of patients receiving etanercept in a real-world setting.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Use Of Etanercept In Patients With Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.detailed_description: Non-interventional study: subjects to be selected according to the usual clinical practice of their physician
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of ankylosing spondylitis (AS) Hypersensitivity to etanercept Active infection including chronic or localised infection Sepsis or risk of sepsis
